data.title: Flash of Genius (DVD)
data.meta_description: Shop Flash of Genius (DVD) at Target. Choose from Same Day Delivery, Drive Up or Order Pickup. Free standard shipping with $35 orders.
data.text: Greg Kinnear stars as college professor and part-time inventor Robert Kearns who engages in a long battle with the US automobile industry to receive recognition for his ingenuity. This determined engineer refused to be silenced and he took on the corporate titans in a battle that nobody thought he could win.
